docs.lead_paragraph: Lawyers and immigrant advocates say the case shows how local police can exceed their authority when they seek to act on immigration laws they are not fully trained to enforce.

docs.lead_paragraph: Never mind its hyperbolic subtitle, David Maraniss’s book is full of great personalities and the unmatchable make-or-break drama of athletic competition.

docs.lead_paragraph: Sue Makin , the newest contributor to this blog, is an American Presbyterian missionary doctor working at a 190-bed mission hospital in southern Malawi. She has been working in Africa for the past 18 years. According to a 2007 study of global maternal mortality rates, more than two-thirds of deaths among Malawian women of reproductive age are linked to pregnancy or childbirth - a larger proportion than in any of the 171 countries in the study.

docs.lead_paragraph: “Birth of a Surgeon” tells an admirable story of women in Mozambique who are being trained to perform Caesarean sections to counteract a severe shortage of doctors.

docs.lead_paragraph: 8 P.M. (Fox) ALL-STAR GAME The National League will try to break its 11-year losing streak in this fourth, and last, Major League Baseball All-Star Game to be played in Yankee Stadium, above. 8 P.M. (ABC Family) THE SECRET LIFE OF THE AMERICAN TEENAGER Ben (Kenny Baumann) and Amy (Shailene Woodley) share their first kiss. In the meantime Amy tells her sister, Ashley (India Eisley), about her pregnancy -- but not her parents.
